tripleplay.particle.Emitter

  • Packages that use Emitter 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.particle  

    • Uses of Emitter in tripleplay.particle

      Fields in tripleplay.particle with type parameters of type Emitter 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      react.Signal<Emitter> Emitter.onEmpty
      A signal emitted when this emitter has no live particles and no generator.
      react.Signal<Emitter> Emitter.onExhausted
      A signal emitted when the generator for this emitter is exhausted.
      Methods in tripleplay.particle that return Emitter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Emitter Particles.createEmitter(int maxParticles, Image image)
      Creates an emitter that supports up to maxParticles particles at any one time.
      Emitter Particles.createEmitter(int maxParticles, Image image, GroupLayer onLayer)
      Creates an emitter that supports up to maxParticles particles at any one time.
      Methods in tripleplay.particle with parameters of type Emitter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean Generator.generate(Emitter emitter, float now, float dt)
      Requests that particles be generated, if appropriate.
